stem: Which data storage service provides data warehouse services for storing data but also offers an interactive SQL interface for querying the data?
options/0/rationale: That is not the right answer. Please go back and review the lectures in this module.
options/1/rationale: I recommend reviewing the lectures in this module.
options/2/rationale: That's incorrect. I recommend going back to the lectures of this module to review this concept.
options/3/rationale: BigQuery is a data warehousing service that allows the storage of huge data sets while making them immediately processable without having to extract or run the processing in a separate service.

stem: Which Google Cloud data storage service offers ACID transactions and can scale globally?
options/0/rationale: That is not the right answer. Please go back and review the lectures in this module.
options/1/rationale: Cloud Spanner provides ACID (Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, Durability) properties that enable transactional reads and writes on the database. It can also scale globally.
options/2/rationale: I recommend reviewing the lectures in this module.
options/3/rationale: That's incorrect. I recommend going back to the lectures of this module to review this concept.

stem: What data storage service might you select if you just needed to migrate a standard relational database running on a single machine in a datacenter to the cloud?
options/0/rationale: That is not the right answer. Please go back and review the lectures in this module.
options/1/rationale: I recommend reviewing the lectures in this module.
options/2/rationale: That's incorrect. I recommend going back to the lectures of this module to review this concept.
options/3/rationale: Cloud SQL offers a PostgreSQL server or a MySQL server as a managed service.
